re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.explorer

Class FileList

  • java.lang.Object
    • re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.explorer.FileList
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClasspathConstructor

    public class FileList
extends java.lang.Object
    The File List

    The File List is a List of files, but with some very useful methods like the add(File Array / FileList / List of file) methods, the match method, etc...

    Since:
    3.0.0-BETA
